summary: A young Japanese woman has been trained to become a professional killer since childhood. Two cops pursue the girl, who has assassinated a Hong Kong official.
cast: Simon Yam|Alex Fong|Hisako Shirata|Shin'ichi Chiba|Lik Chan|Man-Lei Chan|Kim-Fai Che|Hoffman Cheng|Jan-Sang Cheung|Tung Cho 'Joe' Cheung|Wai-Kee Cheung|Chi-Kui Fong|Johnnie Guy|Ping Han|Sze-Ting Ho|Joyce|Norihisa Kamiyama|Kawoma|Risa Kazuki|Wong Yin Keung|Eddy Ko|Zac Koo|Crystal Kwok|Crystal Kwok|Kwok-Kit Lam|Roderick Lam|Suet Lam|Ching-Lam Lau|Tin-Lung Lau|Yau-Kuen Law|Mark Le Gartha|Lam-Yan Lee|Miu-Mak Lee|Paul Logan|Siu-Ming Lui|Alan Chun-Kwong Luk|Man-Wai Luk|Daiki Murata|Kim-Wah Ng|Wing Lun Ng|Shin Nishimura|Samuel Pang|Wai-Ming Pang|Edwin Siu|Rick Smith|Takuji Suzuki|Wai Yin Tse|Ho-Kwun Wong|Jacky Wong|Kin Chung Wong|Mei-Yin Wong|Seung-Hung Yip|Kenneth Yuen|Wai-Ho Yuen|Martin Zetterlund|Kam Pong Chow
title: Bau lit do see
